data.message: :)I liked it an it was hard to understand. Thank you  one of my favorite examples of nasa skill  we do things like : at 12 o'clock I'm going to walk out my front door and at the throw my tennis ball backwards over my head at the same time the person who lives behind me will do the same thing only they have a golf ball and our balls with impact each other at the same time an at exactly where the property line is. :D
